original: Forsen, Erik Gustaf August, kyrkoherde, Tolg, f. 23/1/94 i Långaryd, Jönköp. 1., av org. August F. o. Ingeborg Wahlström. G. 23 m. Signe. Nilisision. Biann: Gö^sita f. 23, Niilis-Erik 24, Karin 28, Göran 31. — Studiex. i Växjö 14, teol. fil. ex. i Upps. 19, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Växjö stift 24. Tjg. som tf. kom-min. i Järsnäs o. v. pastor i Barkeryd, kyrkoh. i Barkeryd 27, i Tolg sed. 37. Ombud f. Sv. kyrkans miss:styr. sed. 40, ordf. i kyrko- o. past :stämman, f^lksik :styr. o. i Tolgs Röda korskrets.
translated: Forsen, Erik Gustaf August, pastor, Tolg, born on January 23, 1894 in Långaryd, Jönköping County. Son of August F. and Ingeborg Wahlström. Married on May 23 to Signe Nilisision. Children: Gö^sita born in 1923, Niilis-Erik in 1924, Karin in 1928, Göran in 1931. He completed his studies in Växjö in 1914, earned a theology degree from Uppsala in 1919, passed his practical theology exam and was ordained as a priest in the Växjö diocese in 1924. He served as a temporary curate in Järsnäs, assistant pastor in Barkeryd, and pastor of Barkeryd from 1927 and Tolg from 1937. Representative of the Swedish Church's Mission Board from 1940, chairman of the Church and Pastoral Conferences, People's Board, and Tolg's Red Cross District.
